name: Gas Design System
description:
About

I created this Design System to help me explore new features and share the results with the community. I use Figma to maintain a Design System at work. The Gas Design System is a personal creation and exists as a test to identify new approaches for UI, UX proposal, and organization of Components and other elements.


Releases

1.4.0

  • Variation: Some components are using Variations feature.

1.3.0

  • Component: Added components Input Select, Navbar options, Modal overlay, Sheet (Bottom or Action shee).
  • Foundation: Added new Icons (Chevrons, Close, ...)
  • Design tokens: Added Level token (Like Elevation)

1.2.0

  • Component: Input text, OS Interface (Generic mobile keyboard)
  • Prototype sample.

1.1.1

  • Component: Navbar now has Default and Overflow states.

1.1.0

  • Foundation: Icons.
  • Components: Navbar, Tags, Button icons.
  • Layout and Grids: More Android and iOS screens just for reference.

1.0.0

  • Foundation: Screen sizes, Spaces, Layout grid, Layout columns.
  • Design tokens: Colors, Typography.
  • Components: Button, Footer.
  • Layout and Grids: Android screen, 3 layouts coluns.
